title: DDFP 597: Week 1 recap, Odell Beckham's impact & Are the Rams legit?
itunes:title: DDFP 597: Week 1 recap, Odell Beckham's impact & Are the Rams legit?
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Maurice Jones-Drew to recap all of the most compelling storylines from Week 1 of the 2017 NFL season, discussing if the Rams will continue to be successful this year and whether or not Adrian Peterson will remain on the Saints' roster this season. Then, Colleen Wolfe joins the fellas for another Q&A session, answering questions from Packers DE Mike Daniels, Vikings CB Xavier Rhodes and members of the Shek Republic. They tackle whether or not Odell Beckham Jr. is the Giants' "Jenga piece" and if tank tops are acceptable for grown men to wear when they're not working out.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
